scripts.install-server: cd Log-Ingestor-and-Query-Interface && cd Log-Ingestor && npm install
scripts.start-server: cd Log-Ingestor-and-Query-Interface && cd Log-Ingestor && npm start
scripts.install-client: cd Log-Ingestor-and-Query-Interface && cd query-interface && npm install
scripts.build-client: cd Log-Ingestor-and-Query-Interface && cd query-interface && npm run build
scripts.start-client: cd Log-Ingestor-and-Query-Interface && cd query-interface && npm start
